DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct evaluate efficacy 91-day extended cycle oral contraceptive compare placebo decrease frequency severity menstrually-related migraine headache .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter Study Evaluate Efficacy 91-Day Extended Cycle Oral Contraceptive Menstrually-Related Migraine Headaches
